questions.question: 1. Dijkstra’s algorithm cannot be applied on ____.

answers.b: Container of objects of similar types
answers.c: Container of objects of mixed types

questions.question: 2. Dijkstra’s Algorithm is the prime example for ________.
3. Given a directed graph where the weight of every edge is the same, we can efficiently find the shortest path from a given source to destination using _______.

answers.b: Neither Breadth First Traversal nor Dijkstra’s algorithm can be used

questions.question: 4. Which of the following algorithms can be used to efficiently calculate single source shortest paths in a Directed Acyclic Graph?
